channel.title: Expedition Quinlon [PI]
channel.description:
This is my first Server Development Post on here and so its simple, just to get more people to join.
This is a server that has tons of stuff too much to describe, perfect pking. It is hosted on a 24/7 vps
What i need is Testers 0/25 Mods 0/5 Admins 0/3 Co-Owner 1/2 Donators 1/∞ Website Coder 1/2
Just some of the customs on here with perfect anims that we have, the most common and best graphical items around on a [PI] [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/customs.jpg[/img]
The player interface you get when right clicking on a player [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/Playerview.png[/img]
The nex monsters to gain the frozen key parts to get to NEX, monsters are torva, pernix and virtus. [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/nexmonsters.jpg[/img]
Nex itself [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/nex.jpg[/img]
The assault minigame [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/Assaultminigame.jpg[/img]
Then donor island
Balance Elemental Only Donator [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/BalanceElemental.jpg[/img]
Kulkershin, he is sorta the devil of the donors! [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/Kulkershin.jpg[/img]
Frost Dragon on donor island [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/Frostdragondonor.jpg[/img]
Nex on donor island, no frost key needed! [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/DonorNex.jpg[/img]
Sea Troll Queen [img]http://i1220.photobucket.com/albums/dd448/laakerules/SeaTrollQueen.jpg[/img]
Things to come Castle Wars, close to 100% hunting, More custom Minigames, and clan wars.
Give me ideas if you have them.
Application for spots! In the game! [code] In-Game Name: Spot you want: Reason you deserve spot: Experience: State or Province: [/code]
Our simple Website is [url=http://quinlon.yolasite.com/]http://quinlon.yolasite.com/[/url]

item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

mr extremez:

I dont like doing things with customs i perfer doing things with the parts god gave me.

This whole game base is man made, god didnt make it lol.

I dont like doing things with customs i perfer doing things with the parts god gave me.
